body:
I am seeing the loop in stopTheWorldWithSema which waits for the goroutine
to preempt looping a lot.
In one instance I saw it doing 2850 100 microsecond (285 ms) waits before
the preempt. The program
then reported a 485 ms pause.

On Mon, Jul 13, 2015 at 11:42 AM, Austin Clements <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> My guess is that we sometimes miss a large part of the list during
